Reviews.Title: Great Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: When I saw the Olympus VG 150 Digital camera selling for below $80.00 I figured this would be a good graduation gift for my daughter Tammy since Olympus is a good brand name and it sells for an affordable  price. I made the purchase,  When I received it I was very impressed how thin and light weight it is so I did test drive it , the photos are stunning very sharp and clear. I kept it for myself and purchased another one for Tammy. Also I must say it has loads of features  that I don't even know yet, need to read the manual. I recommend it. It deserves a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Great Xmas Gift.............
Reviews.Author: DomesticDame
Reviews.Content: Gave this to our adult son as one of his gifts.  Did not want to put a lot of money into it, as it was a after thought when he shared that he had accidently dropped his former camera from a three story stairwell.  Turns out, he was thrilled after setting it up.  Started using it almost immediately and the pictures were great.  In fact, I was so impressed, I plan to order one for us to take on a trip.  This size is very small and so much easier to carry then what we have.  excellent camera for the price....

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jessi
Reviews.Content: Does the job,  nice pictures , easy to use ,very compact. Recommended  no words to add couldn't find a better camera worth for its money

ProductInfo.Name: Olympus VG-150 12 Megapixel 4x Wide Optical Zoom 2.7
